name: CardPeeGee (vanilla)
description:
CardPeeGee is a turn-based RPG system that uses standard playing cards - the rules are available at CardPeeGee.com

The video game is based on the simplified 'vanilla' ruleset and is mainly intended as a learning aid to help players who are new to the game.

For now there's only single player functionality, but if there's enough demand following this release, we'll look at adding multiplayer options, AI opponents, and game options from the expanded rules!
